      • searchDraftPoolDie

        public int searchDraftPoolDie(char[] c)
        Parameters:
        c - input from the user, it's used from "searchDie" method
        Returns:
        index of die in its arraylist, -1 if user's input is wrong, -2 if draft pool is empty (but it couldn't be)

      • searchRoundTrackDie

        public int[] searchRoundTrackDie(char[] ch)
        Parameters:
        ch - input from the user, it's used from "searchDie" method
        Returns:
        index in arraylist of die, index of which arraylist; it returns -3, 0 if round track is empty, -1, 0 if user's input is wrong

      • searchDie

        public int searchDie(char[] chars,
                     java.util.ArrayList<DieInt> dieList)
        Parameters:
        chars - is the user's input
        dieList - list of dice with the die user has asked for
        Returns:
        -2 if dieList size is 0, -1 if input is wrong, else the index of searched die in dieList
